粇字的基本解释

粇
kāng
古同“糠”。

粇
jīng
古同“粳”：“南方之氓，以糯与粇杂以卉药而为饼。”

粇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīng］
［《廣韻》古行切，平庚，見。］
亦作“稉1”。亦作“粇1”。
稻之不黏者。今指一种介于籼稻、穤稻之间的晚稻品种，米粒短而粗，米质黏性较强，胀性小。

粇字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　粇； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页907第13
【集韻】同糠。

粇
Basic explanation of words
粇
kāng
Ancient with "bran".
粇
jīng
"Japonica" in ancient times: "The southern gangsters make cakes with glutinous rice and rice glutinous rice."
粇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jīng］
["Guangyun" Gu Xingqi, Ping Geng, see. ]
Also known as "Japonica 1". Also known as "粇1".
The rice is not sticky. Today refers to a late rice variety between indica and long rice. The rice grains are short and thick, the rice quality is strong, and the swelling is small.
